title: This Tiny PC Is REAL FAST
description: This tiny PC is super fast, but at what cost?  Link to the PC (Affiliate):   Get some AWESOME Dawid T-shirts, Mouse pads and more here:   Play some Minecraft on the Dawid Does Minecraft server courtesy of our friends at Linode! Dawid Does Minecraft Name: Mctenthiddy, server IP: mc.tenthiddy.com It works on Java version 1.19.3  Support the channel on Patreon:    *Follow me on whichever Social media you don't hate* Discord:  Twitch:  Twitch bits on YouTube:   #Dawid #PC #gaming
